attributes.action: ask the Home Secretary to review the available evidence and proscribe the racist group known as the "English Defence League" who plague our cities with violent protests
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The English Defence League claim to fight extremism; but they are themselves an extremist group who use violent protest to stir up hatred against all Muslims. They have nothing positive to contribute to society; but cost tax payers thousands of pounds in police overtime.
